ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates the performance of SciChart when running an N-Body simulation and 100k scatter points
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Runs an NBody simulation with 100,000 entities using the Task Parallel Library. The results are plotted on a SciChart XyScatterRenderableSeries at 30 FPS.
